All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicMenu
    An abstract class used to create menu screens consisting of any number of buttons a title texture
    BasicProjectileSpawner
    This class is used to create simple projectile spawners that just fire a projectile at a target position
    BoxGameEntity
    Creates a Box2D rectangular body and fixture definition *
    CircleGameEntity
    Creates a Box2D circular body and fixture definition
    Entity
    An abstract class designed to extend from any entity based class Ensures all entities have the required methods
    ExplodingBulletCircle
    Class used for creating simple circle projectiles that explode on collision
    Explosion
    This class creates explosion effects, applying a texture and applying knockback and damage to certain objects in range
    FireEngine
    A class used to generate Box Entitys and a sprite with in built resources used as limitations such as ammo for firing projectiles or health
    FireStation
    Creates a fire station body and fixture that the player can interact with through contact
    FrameRate
    A nicer class for showing framerate that doesn't spam the console like Logger.log() https://gist.github.com/williamahartman/5584f037ed2748f57432
    GameContactListener  
    HUD
    Creates the Heads up Display for the user
    InputManager  
    Kroy  
    MapLoader  
    MenuScreen
    Creates the Main Menu Screen
    PauseScreen
    Creates the pause menu screen
    PlayScreen
    Creates the game screen
    Projectiles
    This class is the basis for all projectiles and any projectile must extend this, creates all necessary definitions and allows for easy spawning of multiple projectiles without creating many class object instances
    RandomDirProjectileSpawner
    This class is used to create projectile spawners that fire a set number of projectiles in a random direction from the origin
    SelectFireEngineScreen
    Creates the Select your fire engine screen
    SimpleBulletCircle
    A simple circle projectile that is destroyed on collision
    SpokeProjectileSpawner
    This class is used to create projectile spawners that fire projectiles at set intervals every time an attack call is made
    SpriteHandler
    handles all the sprites created within a particular world/screen
    TitleScreen
    Creates a title screen which consists of a single large texture in the middle of the screen.
    Tower
    Creates a tower game object, an enemy object that attacks if the player gets within a set range
    Utils  
    Weapon
